sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Typography,
  Paper,
  Link,
} from '@mui/material';

const About: React.FC = () => {
  return (
    <Box>
      <Typography variant="h3" component="h1" gutterBottom>
        About Me
      </Typography>

      {/* About Content */}
      <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: 3 }}>
        {/* Bio Section */}
        <Paper elevation={0} sx={{ p: 3, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
          <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
            Biography
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
            [Your professional biography and background]
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
            [Additional information about your interests and goals]
          </Typography>
        </Paper>

        {/* Research Interests */}
        <Paper elevation={0} sx={{ p: 3, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
          <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
            Research Interests
          </Typography>
          <Box component="ul" sx={{ pl: 2 }}>
            <Typography component="li" variant="body1">
              Research Area 1
            </Typography>
            <Typography component="li" variant="body1">
              Research Area 2
            </Typography>
            <Typography component="li" variant="body1">
              Research Area 3
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Paper>

        {/* Contact Information */}
        <Paper elevation={0} sx={{ p: 3, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
          <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
            Contact Information
          </Typography>
          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: 1 }}>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              Email: <Link href="mailto:your.email@example.com">your.email@example.com</Link>
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              Office: [Your Office Location]
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              Phone: [Your Phone Number]
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Paper>

        {/* Social Links */}
        <Paper elevation={0} sx={{ p: 3, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
          <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
            Connect With Me
          </Typography>
          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2 }}>
            <Link href="https://linkedin.com/in/your-profile" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
              LinkedIn
            </Link>
            <Link href="https://github.com/your-username" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
              GitHub
            </Link>
            <Link href="https://twitter.com/your-handle" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
              Twitter
            </Link>
            <Link href="https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=your-id" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
              Google Scholar
            </Link>
          </Box>
        </Paper>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default About;
